name: Tower of Tor-Zor
description:
Tor-Zor the winged imp is incredibly proud of his tower! If only angels and earthquakes weren't always threatening to reduce it to a pile of rubble! Can you help Tor-Zor defeat his enemies, repair his columns, and purchase upgrades?

(created in 72 hours for Ludum Game Jam 49! the theme was "Unstable")
